name: Howard
description: An old fisherman who has lived on the island his entire life and knows its legends better than anyone.

relations.name: Jonas
relations.overallRelation: Thinks he's a good man but doesn’t trust his secrets.
relations.importantInformation: Howard mentioned that Jonas the Knight of the Seas knows more about the mist and what happens on Angel’s Isle.

relations.name: Martha
relations.overallRelation: Finds her to be a good investigator but thinks she shouldn’t get involved in dangerous affairs. Martha spoke with Old Howard, who mentioned some stories about The Patch.

relations.name: Thomas
relations.overallRelation: Finds him a humble, hardworking man but dislikes that he gets involved in dangerous matters.

relations.name: Lady Katrina
relations.overallRelation: Respects and fears her but dislikes when she talks about The Patch.

relations.name: The Mage
relations.overallRelation: Barely knows him but considers him dangerous and doesn’t want anyone near him.

relations.name: Samuel
relations.overallRelation: Doesn't know him but has heard he’s gotten into trouble for talking about The Patch.
